languages.text: "От века не жаловал ксеносов милосердием. И сейчас не желаю начинать. Пусть мучается, пока не околеет".
"I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."
languages.original_text: "От века не жаловал ксеносов милосердием. И сейчас не желаю начинать. Пусть мучается, пока не околеет".

traits.locale_text: "I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺が異種族に情けをかけることはない。今から方針を変えるつもりもない。死に命を奪われるときまで、苦しませておけばいい」
languages.original_text: "I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."

traits.locale_text: 「俺が異種族に情けをかけることはない。今から方針を変えるつもりもない。死に命を奪われるときまで、苦しませておけばいい」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我之前从来没对异形心慈手软过，现在也不打算突然心软。让他受尽折磨而死吧。”
languages.original_text: "I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."

traits.locale_text: “我之前从来没对异形心慈手软过，现在也不打算突然心软。让他受尽折磨而死吧。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai jamais fait preuve de miséricorde envers les xénos et je n'ai nul désir de commencer aujourd'hui. Laissez-le souffrir jusqu'à ce que la mort l'emporte. »
languages.original_text: "I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai jamais fait preuve de miséricorde envers les xénos et je n'ai nul désir de commencer aujourd'hui. Laissez-le souffrir jusqu'à ce que la mort l’emporte. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Nunca he tenido piedad con un xenos, y no estoy por la labor de empezar a hacerlo. Que sufra hasta que le llegue la muerte».
languages.original_text: "I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca he tenido piedad con un xenos, y no estoy por la labor de empezar a hacerlo. Que sufra hasta que le llegue la muerte».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich war zu Xenos noch nie gnädig. Das werde ich auch jetzt nicht ändern. Lasst ihn leiden, bis der Tod ihn erlöst."
languages.original_text: "I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war zu Xenos noch nie gnädig. Das werde ich auch jetzt nicht ändern. Lasst ihn leiden, bis der Tod ihn erlöst."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Zenolara hiç merhametle yaklaşmadım, şimdi de yaklaşacak değilim. Ölüm onu kollarına alana dek acı çeksin."
languages.original_text: "I have never been merciful to xenos. I have no desire to start now. Let him suffer until death claims him."

traits.locale_text: "Zenolara hiç merhametle yaklaşmadım, şimdi de öyle bir niyetim yok. Ölüm onu kollarına alana dek acı çeksin."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
